questions.question_text: Which table must be extended when creating a new case type?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The first step in creating a case type is to create a table for the case type that extends the Case table (sn_customerservice_case).

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-csm-case-types.html

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-csm-case-types.html#:~:text=The%20first%20step%20in%20creating,a%20scope%20other%20than%20global.

choices.C: Improved customer satisfaction as agents can respond to and resolve customer issues faster
choices.B: A customized admin chat toolbar with emojis for agents to use in chat messages
choices.A: Shorter calls for agents by reducing the time to search for information
choices.D: Better language management by flagging key words and alerting chat managers when agents use one or more of those words
